Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the opening goal in the 13th minute from a Dani Olmo pass
Kristjan Asllani's powerful 25-yard strike was saved by David Raya
Armando Broja's shot on the turn was saved by David Raya
Pre-Game Insights: Spain had already secured top spot and made 10 changes to their starting lineup
Spain had won all eight previous matches against Albania
Albania needed to win to progress, but this loss and Italy's draw meant they ended up bottom of the group
Post-Match Reflections: Spain maintained their 100% record at Euro 2024
David Raya kept out key shots from Albania
Albania's Euro adventure ends after a strong showing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Albania scored the fastest goal in Euros history against Italy
Albania drew 2-2 with Croatia in their second match
Spain will face a third-placed finisher from one of Group A, D, E or F in the last-16
